Item 5.07 - Submission of Matters to a V.content: The 2025 Annual Meeting of Shareholders (the “Annual Meeting”) of Apple Inc. (“Apple”) was held on February 25, 2025. At the Annual Meeting, Apple’s shareholders voted on the following seven proposals and cast their votes as described below.

subsections.Proposal 2: Ratification of Independent:
A management proposal to ratify the appointment of Ernst & Young LLP as Apple’s independent registered public accounting firm for fiscal year 2025 was approved.

For: 11,910,666,249
Against: 221,074,424
Abstained: 47,929,139
subsections.Proposal 3: Advisory Vote to Approve Exe:
An advisory resolution to approve executive compensation was approved.

For: 8,397,138,183
Against: 691,312,529
Abstained: 52,954,796
Broker Non-Vote: 3,038,264,304
subsections.Proposal 4: Shareholder Proposal on Ethi:
A shareholder proposal entitled “Report on Ethical AI Data Acquisition and Usage” was not approved.

For: 1,041,899,819
Against: 7,963,197,675
Abstained: 136,308,014
Broker Non-Vote: 3,038,264,304
subsections.Proposal 5: Shareholder Proposal on Chil:
A shareholder proposal entitled “Report on Costs and Benefits of Child Sex Abuse Material-Identifying Software & User Privacy” was not approved.

For: 802,117,145
Against: 8,198,486,901
Abstained: 140,801,462
Broker Non-Vote: 3,038,264,304
subsections.Proposal 6: Shareholder Proposal to Ceas:
A shareholder proposal entitled “Request to Cease DEI Efforts” was not approved.

For: 210,451,697
Against: 8,843,175,086
Abstained: 87,778,725
Broker Non-Vote: 3,038,264,304
subsections.Proposal 7: Shareholder Proposal on Char:
A shareholder proposal entitled “Report on Charitable Giving” was not approved.

For: 169,119,141
Against: 8,884,470,350
Abstained: 87,816,017
Broker Non-Vote: 3,038,264,304
